subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Among the tweaks to N.F.L. rules for 2015 was one that went relatively unnoticed: A conversion after a touchdown can result in a safety, and is worth 1 point.
snippet: Among the tweaks to N.F.L. rules for 2015 was one that went relatively unnoticed: A conversion after a touchdown can result in a safety, and is worth 1 point.
